text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #China allowed coronavirus 2 hit #USA in order 2 destroy the #US economy b4 November elections, just to ensure that @realDonaldTrump does not get re-elected. After all, US has been winning BIG against China with tariffs & other actions. Must investigate this angle. #ChineseVirus
